hadith.text: Amr bin Shu'aib narrated that:His father said: "Mu'awiyah stood up to deliver a sermon and said: 'Where are your scholars? Where are your scholars? For I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: The Hour will not begin until a group of my Ummah will prevail over the people, and they will not care who lets them down and who supports them
